alert.note: Alert for Central Tangipahoa; Lower Tangipahoa (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 23 at 3:02PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHERN TANGIPAHOA PARISH THROUGH 330 PM CDT... At 302 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing funnel clouds near Robert, or 8 miles east of Hammond, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Funnel clouds and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...If a funnel cloud briefly touches down, minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hammond, Ponchatoula, Springfield, Robert, and Natalbany. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 12 between mile markers 35 and 53. Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 15 and 32. FUNNEL CLOUDS...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
